data.text:
¿Qué es, o qué significa Bardo?

Dirigida por Alejandro G. Iñárritu, 'BARDO, Falsa Crónica de unas Cuantas Verdades' está disponible en cines en México, Estados Unidos, Argentina y España, en el resto del mundo a partir del 18 de noviembre, y en Netflix el 16 de diciembre.

What is Bardo? What does it mean?

A film by Alejandro G. Iñárritu, BARDO, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths, is now playing in theaters in Mexico, the US, Argentina, and Spain, globally November 18 and on Netflix on December 16. https://t.co/pkok2XVyxv

urls.title: Interview: Alejandro González Iñárritu on the duality of identity and making his personal dreams the foundation of his vibrant cinematic reality with 'Bardo'
urls.description: From the moment Amores Perros debuted in 2000, writer-director Alejandro González Iñárritu has been examining the emotional tapestry of the human condition, leaving audiences enamored with his visionary takes on a person’s mind and soul.

urls.title: #WARPPresenta: Bardo y unas cuentas verdades con Alejandro González Iñárritu
urls.description: La portada virtual de WARP para el mes de diciembre con la entrevista exclusiva a Alejandro González Iñárritu.

urls.description: From the moment Amores Perros debuted in 2000, writer-director Alejandro González Iñárritu has been examining the emotional tapestry of the human condition, leaving audiences enamored with his visionary takes on a person’s mind and soul.

urls.title: The Soundtrack to Alejandro G. Iñárritu's 'Bardo' will be released next Friday, featuring Original Score by the National's Bryce Dessner & Alejandro G. Iñárritu - Milan Records
urls.description: Also included on the soundtrack are several needledrops featured in the film, ranging from David Bowie’s “Let’s Dance” to contributions from salsa pioneers Héctor Lavoe and Willie Colón, Mexican pop icon José José, “The King of Cumbia” Andrés Landero, conga drummer Joe Cuba and more.

tweets.text:
The @BardoMovie soundtrack marks the latest collaboration between Bryce Dessner and Alejandro G. Iñárritu, the duo having previously worked together on 'The Revenant' soundtrack in 2015.

tweets.text:
Saw Iñarritu's Bardo yesterday, and what a supremely beautifully deep movie, cant recommend it enough.

Especially if you're an immigrant and a latino, it's a personal love letter to our shared experience assimilating and defining our identity. Go watch it 🌌 https://t.co/PRvYtoEC0f

Alejandro G. Iñárritu's "Bardo" film tackles the immigrant experience but also traipses into moments from the director's personal history, Mexican history and dreamlike combinations of the two. https://t.co/fnETZt6siY

urls.title: How Alejandro G. Iñárritu explores his own inner journey through 'Bardo'

Abro hilo. Me tocó muchas emociones @BardoMovie La nostalgia de un México contrapunteado, cuna de dualidades, inspiración e impotencia; una visión poética del trayecto entre el nacimiento y el cierre de tus ciclos. Me gusta el riesgo, el atrevimiento, el ímpetu de Iñárritu,

urls.title: Bardo. Falsa crónica de unas cuantas verdades - Filmoteca UNAM
urls.description: Rescatar, restaurar, catalogar, preservar y difundir imágenes en movimiento, así como sus elementos sonoros y todos los documentos escritos e iconográficos, y aparatos cinematográficos, que forman el patrimonio fílmico nacional e internacional en resguardo de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México.

tweets.text: 🎬 Análisis | “#Bardo (@BardoMovie) es una película que cuenta la épica onírica sobre el malogrado regreso de un héroe (¿antihéroe?) a su tierra natal, en este caso un México-Ítaca hecho de recuerdos, falsas expectativas y espejismos”, escribe @anarconde https://t.co/ISzU1jQdK1

#Bardo is magical, honest, critical, and reflective. I went in expecting stunning visuals, and left with a film that will sit me with for the rest of my life. Yes, it is visually impressive as González Iñárritu's work tends to be. But more importantly, it is deeply intentional. https://t.co/gAg4nDT1TS

“[It] is a walk in the consciousness of a guy who is realizing all that he is not,” Alejandro G. Iñárritu told IndieWire of #Bardo. He added that “bardo” for him is a life-changing revelation that comes when we “realize all that we are not and let it go.” https://t.co/SgiEPYSp8G https://t.co/Vq7sjkHPnm
